titleStmt.title: This book makes appear the claim, pedigree and proceedings of James Percy now claimant to the Earldom of Northumberland humbly presented to both Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Percy, James, 1619-1690?

notesStmt.note: Imprint date illegible on t.p. Date provided by NUC pre-1956 imprint.
Includes: "A narrative of the proceedings of the petitioner," and various petitions to the King and Houses of Parliament.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
